channel.title: AI Change Watcher (All)
channel.description: All detected text changes (may include noise). Verify on official sources.

item.title: [Breaking] OpenAI OpenAPI Spec (YAML)
item.description:
Summary (JA, 3 lines):
OpenAPI仕様が大幅に更新されバージョン2.3.0へ上がったようです。
APIの基本情報や利用規約、連絡先などが新たに追加された可能性があります。
エンドポイントのURLや認証方式が明示され、タグによる機能分類も示されたように見えます。

Please verify on the official page.
Source: https://app.stainless.com/api/spec/documented/openai/openapi.documented.yml

Diff (excerpt):
-{
- "components": {
- "schemas": {
- "ActiveStatus": {
- "description": "Indicates that a thread is active.",
- "properties": {
- "type": {
- "default": "active",
- "description": "Status discriminator that is always `active`.",
- "enum": [
- "active"
+openapi: 3.1.0
+info:
+ title: OpenAI API
+ description: The OpenAI REST API. Please see https://platform.openai.com/docs/api-reference for more details.
+ version: 2.3.0
+ termsOfService: https://openai.com/policies/terms-of-use
+ contact:
+ name: OpenAI Support
+ url: https://help.openai.com/
+ license:
+ name: MIT
+ url: https://github.com/openai/openai-openapi/blob/master/LICENSE
+servers:
+ - url: https://api.openai.com/v1
+security:
+ - ApiKeyAuth: []
+tags:
+ - name: Assistants
+ description: Build Assistants that can call models and use tools.
+ - name: Audio
+ description: Turn audio into text or text into audio.
+ - name: Chat
+ description: Given a list of messages comprising a conversation, the model will return a response.
+ - name: Conversations
+ description: Manage conversations and conversation items.
+ - name: Completions
+ description: >-
+ Given a prompt, the model will return one or more predicted completions, and can also return the
+ probabilities of alternative tokens at each position.

item.title: [Breaking] OpenAI OpenAPI Spec (YAML)
item.description:
Summary (JA, 3 lines):
OpenAI OpenAPIの仕様全体が削除されたように見えます。
APIのタイトルやバージョン情報、サーバーURL、認証情報も含めて一括で除去された可能性があります。
この変更は互換性に大きな影響を及ぼす破壊的変更のように読み取れます。

Please verify on the official page.
Source: https://app.stainless.com/api/spec/documented/openai/openapi.documented.yml

Diff (excerpt):
-openapi: 3.1.0
-info:
- title: OpenAI API
- description: The OpenAI REST API. Please see https://platform.openai.com/docs/api-reference for more details.
- version: 2.3.0
- termsOfService: https://openai.com/policies/terms-of-use
- contact:
- name: OpenAI Support
- url: https://help.openai.com/
- license:
- name: MIT
- url: https://github.com/openai/openai-openapi/blob/master/LICENSE
-servers:
- - url: https://api.openai.com/v1
-security:
- - ApiKeyAuth: []
-tags:
- - name: Assistants
- description: Build Assistants that can call models and use tools.
- - name: Audio
- description: Turn audio into text or text into audio.
- - name: Chat
- description: Given a list of messages comprising a conversation, the model will return a response.
- - name: Conversations
- description: Manage conversations and conversation items.
- - name: Completions
- description: >-
- Given a prompt, the model will return one or more predicted completions, and can also return the
- probabilities of alternative tokens at each position.
- - name: Embeddings
- description: >-
- Get a vector representation of a given input that can be easily consumed by machine learning models and
- algorithms.
- - name: Evals
- description: Manage and run evals in the OpenAI platform.
- - name: Fine-tuning
- description: Manage fine-tuning jobs to tailor a model to your specific training data.
- - name: Graders
- description: Manage and run graders in the OpenAI platform.
- - name: Batch

item.title: [High] OpenAI Developer Changelog (RSS)
item.description:
Summary (JA, 3 lines):
コードクライ CLIでマルチエージェントの制限が強化されたように見えます。
ネットワークアクセス制御としてサンドボックスプロキシやプロキシ構成が追加された可能性があります。
コネクター対応が一部実装され、コラボレーション機能がベータで提供開始のようです。

Please verify on the official page.
Source: https://developers.openai.com/changelog/rss.xml

Diff (excerpt):
-<ul>
-<li>Reduced the maximum allowed number of sub-agents by half to tighten resource usage and guardrails in agent fan-out behavior (<a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text
-</ul>
-<h2>Changelog</h2>
-<p>Full Changelog: <a class="commit-link" href="https://github.com/openai/codex/compare/rust-v0.90.0...rust-v0.91.0"><tt>rust-v0.90.0...rust-v0.91.0</tt>&l
-<ul>
-<li><a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text="Failed to load title" data-id="3853518456" data-permission-text="Title is private" data-url=&
-</ul>Codex CLI Release: 0.90.0https://developers.openai.com/changelog/#github-release-279750097https://developers.openai.com/cha
-<ul>
-<li>Added a network sandbox proxy with policy enforcement to better control outbound network access. (<a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text="Failed to load title
-<li>Introduced the first phase of connectors support via the app server and MCP integration, including new config/docs updates. (<a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text
-<li>Shipped collaboration mode as beta in the TUI, with a clearer plan → execute handoff and simplified mode selection (Coding vs Plan). (<a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-e
-<li>Added ephemeral threads and improved collaboration tool provenance metadata for spawned threads. (<a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text="Failed to load title
-<li>WebSocket connections now support proxy configuration. (<a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text="Failed to load title" data-id="3845092743" data
-<li>More strict limitation on multi-agents</li>
-</ul>
-<h2>Bug Fixes</h2>
-<ul>
-<li>Fixed exec policy parsing for multiline quoted arguments. (<a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text="Failed to load title" data-id="3836034142" d
-<li><code>--yolo</code> now skips the git repository check instead of failing outside a repo. (<a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text="Failed to load
-<li>Improved resume reliability by handling out-of-order events and prompting for the working directory when it differs. (<a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text="
-<li>Backspace no longer deletes a text element when the cursor is at the element’s left edge. (<a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text="Failed to load title"
-<li>Config loading errors are clearer and more actionable across surfaces. (<a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text="Failed to load title" data-id="38461
-<li>Default model selection now respects filtered presets to avoid invalid defaults. (<a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text="Failed to load title" data-id=&
-</ul>
-<h2>Documentation</h2>
-<ul>
-<li>Corrected a typo in the experimental collaboration prompt template. (<a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text="Failed to load title" data-id="38448345
-<li>Added documentation for the new connectors configuration surface. (<a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text="Failed to load title" data-id="3841758895
-</ul>
-<h2>Chores</h2>
-<ul>
-<li>Refreshed the bundled model catalog/presets. (<a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text="Failed to load title" data-id="3845282520" data-permissio
-<li>Updated GitHub Actions for Node 24 compatibility. (<a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text="Failed to load title" data-id="3845139125" data-perm
-</ul>
-<h2>Changelog</h2>
-<p>Full Changelog: <a class="commit-link" href="https://github.com/openai/codex/compare/rust-v0.89.0...rust-v0.90.0"><tt>rust-v0.89.0...rust-v0.90.0</tt>&l
-<ul>
-<li><a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text="Failed to load title" data-id="3844558191" data-permission-text="Title is private" data-url=&
-<li><a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text="Failed to load title" data-id="3844834568" data-permission-text="Title is private" data-url=&

item.title: [High] OpenAI News (RSS)
item.description:
Summary (JA, 3 lines):
OpenAI News (RSS)から多数の記事が削除されたように見えます。削除された記事にはGPT-5関連や企業提携の記事が含まれている可能性があります。これにより影響度が高いニュースフィードの内容変化が予想されます。
差分のみ要確認のように見える
差分のみ要確認のように見える

Please verify on the official page.
Source: https://openai.com/news/rss.xml

Diff (excerpt):
